attributes.action: A by election  will be triggered if a sitting  MP switches political party.
attributes.additional_details: It seems indefensible for an MP to change political party and not allow the constituents to have the opportunity to endorse or otherwise that change.
attributes.background:
If  a sitting MP changes political party during the term of a parliament an
 by election in that constituency is automatically triggered .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

By-elections to be called automatically when MPs defect to another party
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737660
